{
 "cells": [
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "# Validation of SIS model (Numerical vs Analytical)\n",
    "\n",
    "* This is in reference to Haris et al. (2018)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "import numpy as np\n",
    "from ler.lens_galaxy_population import OpticalDepth\n",
    "import matplotlib.pyplot as plt\n",
    "%matplotlib inline \n",
    "\n",
    "from astropy.cosmology import LambdaCDM\n",
    "cosmo = LambdaCDM(H0=70, Om0=0.3, Ode0=0.7)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "* optical_depth_SIS_hemanta is the numerical solution of the SIS model"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 3,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "z_to_Dc interpolator will be generated at ./interpolator_json/z_to_Dc/z_to_Dc_3.pickle\n",
      "Dc_to_z interpolator will be generated at ./interpolator_json/Dc_to_z/Dc_to_z_3.pickle\n",
      "angular_diameter_distance interpolator will be generated at ./interpolator_json/angular_diameter_distance/angular_diameter_distance_3.pickle\n",
      "differential_comoving_volume interpolator will be generated at ./interpolator_json/differential_comoving_volume/differential_comoving_volume_3.pickle\n",
      "velocity_dispersion_gengamma interpolator will be generated at ./interpolator_json/velocity_dispersion_gengamma/velocity_dispersion_gengamma_2.pickle\n",
      "optical_depth_SIS_hemanta interpolator will be generated at ./interpolator_json/optical_depth_SIS_hemanta/optical_depth_SIS_hemanta_1.pickle\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "od = OpticalDepth(\n",
    "    z_min=0.001, \n",
    "    z_max=40,\n",
    "    optical_depth_function=\"optical_depth_SIS_hemanta\",\n",
    "    sampler_priors=dict(\n",
    "        velocity_dispersion=\"velocity_dispersion_gengamma\",\n",
    "        axis_ratio=\"axis_ratio_rayleigh\",\n",
    "    ),\n",
    "    sampler_priors_params=dict(\n",
    "        velocity_dispersion=dict(vd_min=0., vd_max=600),\n",
    "        axis_ratio=dict(q_min=0.2, q_max=1),\n",
    "    ),\n",
    "    cosmology=cosmo,\n",
    "    directory=\"./interpolator_json\",\n",
    "    #create_new_interpolator=True,\n",
    "    )"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 4,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 400x400 with 1 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "zs = np.geomspace(0.001, 2, 100)\n",
    "tau_sis = od.strong_lensing_optical_depth(zs)\n",
    "tau_sis_haris = od.optical_depth_SIS_haris(zs)\n",
    "\n",
    "# plot \n",
    "plt.figure(figsize=(4,4))\n",
    "plt.plot(zs, tau_sis, label='SIS hemanta')\n",
    "plt.plot(zs, tau_sis_haris, label='SIS haris')\n",
    "plt.xlabel('redshift')\n",
    "plt.ylabel('optical depth')\n",
    "plt.legend()\n",
    "plt.grid(alpha=0.5)\n",
    "plt.show()\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 5,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 400x400 with 1 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "zs = np.geomspace(0.001, 40, 100)\n",
    "tau_sis = od.strong_lensing_optical_depth(zs)\n",
    "tau_sis_haris = od.optical_depth_SIS_haris(zs)\n",
    "\n",
    "# plot \n",
    "plt.figure(figsize=(4,4))\n",
    "plt.plot(zs, tau_sis, label='SIS hemanta')\n",
    "plt.plot(zs, tau_sis_haris, label='SIS haris')\n",
    "plt.xlabel('redshift')\n",
    "plt.ylabel('optical depth')\n",
    "plt.legend()\n",
    "plt.grid(alpha=0.5)\n",
    "plt.show()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "* close enough"
   ]
  },

   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
